Question: Nathaniel later added a "w" to make his name "this person" in order to hide this relation.
Hints: Poet John Greenleaf Whittier wrote that he admired the "weird and subtle beauty" in this person's tales.
A Democrat, this person lost this job due to the change of administration in Washington after the presidential election of 1848.
Nevertheless, the poet Ellery Channing reported that this person "has suffered much living in this place".
